Mr. Edwin T. Cornelius
October 30, 19&3

It is our understanding that for consideration of rights to publish
and distribute the listener guides and pamphlets based on these
materials, the English language Service, Inc., would be willing to
undertake this work. Me are very much interested in this possibility
and feel that appropriate arrangements could be made to provide these
rights as long as various interests of the N.A.E.B. and the United
States Information Agency are given consideration.
Me appreciate your interest in this effort and look forward to receiving
a proposal which will cover the work which needs to be dene and the
conditions under which you would find it acceptable to enter into a
contract to carry this out*
Sincerely,
JAF:se
James A. Fellows
